## IEasyCallControlBase.startCall() method

Sets the device into call state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
startCall(): Promise<void>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;void&gt;

## Exceptions

If the device is used by another softphone.
